data: Pokémon Alert has been set for {0}.

Please make sure both of these settings are enabled to access this feature.

1. Settings > General > Adventure Sync

2. Settings > Notifications > Adventure Sync: Nearby

이 길을 선택하면 알로와 GO로켓단을 조사할 수 있습니다.
이것을 선택하면 칸델라와 함께 유대에 대해 배웁니다.
이것을 선택하면 블랑쉬와 방어 전략에 대해 조사할 수 있습니다.
이것을 선택하면 클리프와 공격에 대해 조사를 할 수 있습니다.
랄토스 커뮤니티 데이(복각): 보너스 시간제한 리서치
나오하 커뮤니티 데이 컨티뉴 시간제한 리서치
포켓몬 플레이그라운드에서 나갑니다. 다시 들어가거나 다른 장소에서 시도해 주십시오.
통신 설정을 확인하거나 통신 환경이 더 원활한 장소에서 시도해 주세요
이 트레이너는 현재 반짝이 참 수령을 허용하지 않았습니다.
그레이트 프렌드 이상이 아니면 반짝이 참을 사용할 수 없습니다.
You can continue earning rewards. Let’s see how far you can get!

프리즈볼트는 포켓몬을 마비시켜 잡으려고 할 때 반격하는 등의 움직임이 멈춥니다.

Pokémon Alerts notify you when a selected Pokémon is nearby in the wild via in-game notification and push notifications. Please note that push notifications appear less often.

현지 시간 2025년 2월 1일 10시 ~ 2월 28일 20시까지 다음을 포함한 "부화 정기권: 2월" 보너스를 받을 수 있는 티켓. - 매일 처음 포켓스톱을 스핀했을 때 받을 수 있는 1번만 사용 가능한 부화장치(2월 1일 또는 그 이전에 티켓을 구매하면 최대 28개) - 매일 처음 포켓스톱 스핀으로 받을 수 있는 XP 3배 - 매일 첫 1마리에서 받을 수 있는 XP 3배 - 도구 가방에 가질 수 있는 선물의 수 2배(합계 40개) - 하루에 포켓스톱 또는 체육관을 스핀해서 받을 수 있는 선물의 수 최대 150개 - 하루에 열 수 있는 선물의 최대 수 50개 완료하면 15,000XP와 별의모래 15,000개를 받을 수 있는 시간제한 리서치를 받을 수 있습니다. 자세한 내용은 게임 내 새소식에서 확인하세요. 모든 리워드를 받으려면 시간 내에 플레이를 완료해야 합니다

현지 시간 2025년 1월 1일 10시 ~ 1월 31일 20시까지 다음을 포함한 "부화 정기권: 1월" 보너스를 받을 수 있는 티켓. - 매일 처음 포켓스톱을 스핀했을 때 받을 수 있는 1번만 사용 가능한 부화장치(1월 1일 또는 그 이전에 티켓을 구매하면 최대 31개) - 매일 처음 포켓스톱 스핀으로 받을 수 있는 XP 3배 - 매일 첫 1마리에서 받을 수 있는 XP 3배 - 도구 가방에 가질 수 있는 선물의 수 2배(합계 40개) - 하루에 포켓스톱 또는 체육관을 스핀해서 받을 수 있는 선물의 수 최대 150개 - 하루에 열 수 있는 선물의 최대 수 50개 완료하면 15,000XP와 별의모래 15,000개를 받을 수 있는 시간제한 리서치를 받을 수 있습니다. 자세한 내용은 게임 내 새소식에서 확인하세요. 모든 리워드를 받으려면 시간 내에 플레이를 완료해야 합니다. 이 티켓을 구매하면 부화장치 백팩을 받을 수 있는 버전을 구매할 수 없습니다. 다른 버전에 대한 자세한 내용은 여기를 확인해 주세요.
설날 이벤트 프리미엄 시간제한 리서치 티켓
강철의 결심 프리미엄 시간제한 리서치 티켓
패션 위크 프리미엄 시간제한 리서치 티켓
We found it! Kyurem, the Boundary Pokémon, is very likely the cause of the ongoing anomalies we are observing.
This legendary Pokémon is missing parts from its body. It must freeze itself over to stabilize its cellular structure.
Its genes are quite similar to those of two other Legendary Pokémon: Reshiram and Zekrom. Our readings indicate it's seeking them out now.
Let's keep a close eye on the situation, %PLAYERNAME%. Any meeting between these powerful Pokémon could get out of control, fast.
Kyurem has the ability to fuse with either Reshiram, the Vast White Pokémon, or Zekrom, the Deep Black Pokémon.
When it does, it absorbs either Reshiram to become White Kyurem, or Zekrom to become Black Kyurem.
We don't know which one Kyurem will choose, and we can only focus on one at a time.
But be warned! By tracking down either Reshiram or Zekrom first, we give Kyurem the chance to find the other.
In other words, would you rather encounter Reshiram and then Black Kyurem, or Zekrom and then White Kyurem?
Reshiram can move the atmosphere with heat energy just by flaring its tail. In myths, when people ignored truth and became consumed by greed, it burned their kingdoms down.
It may be the Vast White Pokémon, but I'd be scared to tell it even a little white lie!
But apparently, Reshiram also helps those who want to build a world of truth. What's your truth, %PLAYERNAME%?
It might help to decide before you seek Reshiram out. Take care not to get scorched!
Zekrom's tail contains a giant generator. When a part inside its tail spins like a motor, Zekrom can blast its surroundings with electricity.
In the past, when people lost the righteousness in their hearts, they say Zekrom razed their kingdoms with bolts of lightning.
But apparently, Zekrom also assists those who want to build an ideal world. What does your ideal world look like, %PLAYERNAME%?

Mine's one with a comprehensive database recording knowledge about Pokémon, including their habitats and distribution. Follow a dream like that, and Zekrom won't find anything in your heart worth zapping!
It is rumored that Reshiram and Zekrom were once a single Pokémon.
They say this ancient dragon split apart during a conflict. As for Kyurem, I'm not sure of its origins.
I have heard stories from other researchers, but unfortunately, no record was found.
What a fascinating mystery! All three of these powerful Pokémon are hinted to have deep connections with Unova.
Perhaps by studying more Pokémon discovered in Unova, we can gain a better understanding of who they are.
Many Trainers from Unova pick Oshawott as their first partner Pokémon.
Oshawott fights using the scalchop on its stomach like a knife, blocking attacks before retaliating quickly.
It continues to hone its skill as it evolves, and eventually, human swordfighters imitate its movement instead of the other way around!
Pokémon can always teach us something new, even if we already have a hundred battles under our belt. Take good care of Oshawott and see what else you can learn!
Many Trainers from Unova pick Snivy as their first partner Pokémon.
Did you notice its little hands? They're quite short, so Snivy likes to use its vines in its day-to-day life instead.
Snivy are known to be intelligent and calm, but they can move quickly when charged with sunlight.
Pokémon can always teach us something new, even if we already have a hundred battles under our belt. Take good care of Snivy and see what else you can learn!
Many Trainers from Unova pick Tepig as their first partner Pokémon.
It's faster than it looks! Be careful where you put down your lunch, or else Tepig might seize it in a flash.
This ravenous glutton also has an excellent sense of smell, allowing it to quickly find berries in the wild, and then burn them to a crisp for its meal.
Pokémon can always teach us something new, even if we already have a hundred battles under our belt. Take good care of Tepig and see what else you can learn!
We found Reshiram, but now Kyurem's attention has shifted. Are you ready to face Zekrom too?
Once Zekrom and Kyurem have calmed down, you can use the DNA Splicers to help them fuse into Black Kyurem.
I think Kyurem yearns to be whole — not just for its own sake, but so it can protect the ideal world it has foreseen for people and Pokémon.
A Pokémon so dedicated to ideals deserves a chance to fight for that future, don't you think? Good luck, %PLAYERNAME%.
We found Zekrom, but now Kyurem's attention has shifted. Are you ready to face Reshiram too?
Once Reshiram and Kyurem have calmed down, you can use the DNA Splicers to help them fuse into White Kyurem.
I think Kyurem yearns to be whole — not just for its own sake, but so it can protect the world of truth it's foreseen for people and Pokémon.
A Pokémon so dedicated to truth deserves a chance to fight for that future, don't you think? Good luck, %PLAYERNAME%.
Incredible... I have only read about Absofusion, but I never imagined I'd witness the process firsthand.
What of you, %PLAYERNAME%? Did you ever expect to see such a powerful expression of truth and ideals?
The people of this world are quite passionate about their dreams. At first I thought their differences were irreconcilable, but now I see they complement each other once united.
I am unsure if I will remain here long enough to see the future that Kyurem foresaw. But I'd certainly like to work toward it, together with you.
Good, you’re here! I have news about Kyurem, the Dragon- and Ice-type Legendary Pokémon!
Supposedly, it uses its powers over ice to freeze its body to stabilize its cellular structure.
Just thinking about that sends a chill down my spine!
And on that note, let’s do some warm-ups. Gotta stay limber for a big day of exploring, right?
Rumor has it that Kyurem dwells in the Unova region.
Unova is an extraordinary place! It has bustling modern metropolises, but there are also tranquil forests whose inhabitants live in harmony with nature.
And since we’re going to unravel a Unova mystery, it’s only fitting that we get help from Pokémon first discovered there.
Which of these first partner Pokémon would you like to join you on this adventure?
Here’s a fun fact about Oshawott: the shell it has is called a “scalchop.”
They use their scalchop not only as a blade in battle, but also as a tool to break open hard Berries.
They’ll even sharpen them on riverbed stones, something apparently learned by mimicking humans using whetstones.
In other words, Oshawott need to take good care of their scalchops in order to thrive.
I’d bet Kyurem has some particular needs of its own. While you train your new partner, I’ll study Kyurem to see what they might be.
Snivy prefers to avoid groups, so it’s a great match for Trainers who tend to be more independent.
The leaf on its tail generates energy when exposed to sunlight. When it’s not feeling well, the tail will start to droop.
On the other hand—or vine—Snivy that get enough light become swift and dexterous!
In other words, Snivy need alone time and ample sunlight to thrive.
I’d bet Kyurem has some particular needs of its own. While you train your new partner, I’ll study Kyurem to see what they might be.
Make sure you have lots of Berries on hand if you’re going adventuring with Tepig!
They use their excellent sense of smell to find food, and then they cook it up nice and crispy before they eat it!
It can launch fireballs from its nose, but don’t expect more than pitch-black smoke if it gets sick.
In any case, Tepig need snacks aplenty to thrive.
I’d bet Kyurem has some particular needs of its own. While you train your new partner, I’ll study Kyurem to see what they might be.
Kyurem seems to be looking for something...
Hi there, %PLAYERNAME%. So, given what I can glean from my research, Kyurem seems to be looking for something.
From what I’ve read, it’s waiting for a hero to fill in the missing parts of its body with either truth or ideals.
Heady stuff, eh? While you’re certainly a hero in my book, I don’t know what to do with the rest of it.
Now that was an inspiring battle! Just goes to show that when people and Pokémon work together, we can overcome any differences and achieve our biggest dreams!
Oshawott looks like it learned a lot from you, too. In fact, I think it’s ready to evolve!
And while this probably won’t be the last we see of Kyurem, you averted a real disaster by defeating it. For now, enjoy your adventures, %PLAYERNAME%!
For now, the best we can do is try and keep Kyurem busy. Battle it with everything you’ve got, and I’m sure you’ll succeed!
Now that was an inspiring battle! Just goes to show that when people and Pokémon work together, we can overcome any differences and achieve our biggest dreams!
Snivy looks like it learned a lot from you, too. In fact, I think it’s ready to evolve!
Now that was an inspiring battle! Just goes to show that when people and Pokémon work together, we can overcome any differences and achieve our biggest dreams!
Tepig looks like it learned a lot from you, too. In fact, I think it’s ready to evolve!
And while this probably won’t be the last we see of Kyurem, you averted a real disaster by defeating it. For now, enjoy your adventures, %PLAYERNAME%!
Hey there, %PLAYERNAME%! Funny you should pop by—I was just reflecting on our incredible journey together!
Encountering gigantic Pokémon, unfurling incredible mysteries, foiling Team GO Rocket countless times... We’ve faced extraordinary challenges together, haven’t we?
Our research has introduced us to Pokémon from all over the world, forged wonderful friendships, and led to some amazing discoveries.
And speaking of discoveries, I’ve noticed some unusual sounds lately.
I’m going to investigate, and while I do, I need you to continue your excellent work in the field.
Good news, %PLAYERNAME%! I’ve made a breakthrough on those acoustic mysteries I was looking into.
And as I suspected, they’re not just any sound wave, they’re the unique melodies of the Mythical Pokémon Meloetta!
Meloetta uses song to influence the emotions of those who hear it. And on that note, I’d like you to try and spot any unusual behavior in the local Pokémon.
It’s not every day we get to study a Mythical Pokémon, so let’s make the most of this opportunity!
Hello again, %PLAYERNAME%! We may not have found Meloetta yet, but I can definitely still hear it.
So our musical friend can’t be too far off—we just might have to change our usual pitch.
Why don’t you go out and do a little singing and dancing to see if it affects people and Pokémon nearby?
Who knows, that might be the "key" to success! Heh heh... Music joke. I’ve got a million!
If it isn’t our intrepid enter-Trainer! Say, did you know that Meloetta’s melodies have inspired many famous songs?
It’s just fascinating—Meloetta shows us how music helps us to forge special bonds with one another.
It’s not unlike your amazing ability to connect with other people and Pokémon. Every new Pokémon you catch or Trainer you meet is a new potential friend!
And on that uplifting note, get out there and see what new friendships await, %PLAYERNAME%.
%PLAYERNAME%! I’ve dug up some useful information on Meloetta. Did you know that it was first discovered in the Unova region?
That might not seem critical, but we have to take advantage of every scrap of information we can to help us make sense of Meloetta’s behavior.
Keep up your fieldwork, if you would! Watch for Pokémon experiencing strong emotions, check out some new places, and maybe try to forge some new connections.
Let’s keep this research rhythm going!
This is the moment we’ve been waiting for, %PLAYERNAME%!
Your dedicated work has helped me to pinpoint Meloetta’s location at last!
This could be your chance to befriend an extraordinary Pokémon.
Head out there and show Meloetta the same kindness and dedication you’ve shown all your Pokémon friends!
What a striking appearance this Meloetta has! My research notes have nothing about this distinctive coloring. It’s truly incredible!
I’ve been watching your journey since you took your first steps as a Trainer. Seeing how far you’ve come makes me so proud to call you my research partner—and more importantly, my friend!
I know you’ll keep that Meloetta singing proudly, %PLAYERNAME%. You never fall flat!
The event Tour Pass is available now
Hi there, %PLAYERNAME%! Which one of these Pokémon would you like to join you on your adventure today?
Pokémon GO Tour: 하나지방 -  Los Angeles에 어서 오세요!

랭크마다 추가 리워드를 받을 수 있습니다.
랭크마다 받을 수 있는 추가 리워드에 덧붙여 10랭크 상승과 이벤트 스티커를 받을 수 있습니다.
디럭스 코스를 선택하면 프리미엄 리워드를 받고 비크티니와 바로 만날 수 있습니다!
Pokémon Presents 2025 x GO Tour: Unova Timed Research
Pokémon Presents 2025 x GO Tour: Unova Timed Research (1/1)
랭크가 올라가면 리워드가 잠금 해제 됩니다. 이벤트 중 플레이하지 않으면 리워드는 받을 수 없습니다.

투어패스 디럭스를 구매하면 다음 리워드를 받을 수 있습니다!
- 비크티니와의 만남
- 반짝반짝 프렌드가 될 수 있는 도구 반짝이 참

Earn the bronze Showcase Star medal
이 세상의자연, 그리고 인간계에 있는 이중성... 거기서 볼 수 있는 두드러진 대조.
최근 본 것으로 특별히 흥미로웠던 것이 있어.
그건, 블랑쉬와 클리프 두 사람이 배틀에 관심을 두었다는 것. 그러면서 한쪽은 방어 전략을 나머지 한쪽은 궁극적인 힘을 추구했지.
좀 더 생각해보고 싶어. 윌로우박사의 의견도 들어보고 싶네.
%PLAYERNAME%, 배틀에 관해서는 당신쪽이 경험이 풍부하지. 그러니까 알려주면 좋겠어. 포켓몬 트레이너가 목표로 하는 것은 균형잡힌 접근이라는 말에 동의해?
응, 그렇구나. 그럼 그게 이번 일을 해결하는 열쇠가 되겠지.
모든 것은 2가지 면을 가지고 있고 한쪽만 봐도 좋은 결과를 얻을 수 없다는, 그런 거구나.
앞으로의 일을 생각하면... 조금 더 기다리면 박사가 칸델라와 GO로켓단 리더 중 하나에 대한 정보를 알려 줄 거야.
그럼 박사의 연락이 있을 때까지 잘 지내. 뭐라고 하더라... "나중에 뵙겠습니다".
클리프가 지금까지와 다르게 트레이닝을 열심히 하고 게다가 새로운 공격중시 전략을 따른 것이라고 해.
블랑쉬는 블랑쉬로 깨달음이 있었다고 하더라. 포켓몬 방어에 대한 고찰이야.
공격과 방어라는 서로 반대이면서 보완이 되는 요소. 이것을 살펴 보면 알게 되는 게 있을 거야.
또 너에게 묻도록 하지. 어떤 전략을 조사하고 싶어?
연구 결과 당연하다고 하면 당연한데, 패배하지 않는 것이 승리로 가는 가장 확실한 길인 것 같다고 생각했어.
즉, 포켓몬이 기절하지 않는 것. 이 점을 염두하면 그 앞에 보이는 것은 승리, 라는 거지.
라프라스와 함께 이 방법론을 실전하고 방어력을 최대화 하는 시도를 하고 있어. 너와 네 포켓몬도 참가해보지 않을래?
이봐, 그런 곳에 서 있지마! 트레이닝 중이라고!
상대를 치는 순간의 풀파워! 이제 GO로켓단에게 반항하는 적은 없을 거야. 뭐? 믿기 힘든가?
별거 아냐. 강력한 한방으로 때려눕히고 조금이라도 반격을 못 하게 하는 거지!
흥, 너와 상관없으려나. 네 포켓몬은 그렇게까지 강해질 수 없어.
어쨌든 더 이상 방해하면 뜨거운 맛을 보여주지!
최근 배틀 분석 말인데, 내 이론의 반증이 된 것 같아. 협력해줬는데 미안하네.
방어 전략에 너무 초점을 맞춰서 라프라스에게 하는 공격 지시가 소홀했어.
결과적으로 라프라스의 성장을 방해한 것 같아. 다음에 해야 하는 것은 더 균형 잡힌 트레이닝이야.
바로 시작할 필요는 없어, %PLAYERNAME%. 오늘은 검증 결과로도 충분해.
흠, 강함의 지배는 틀림 없는데.... 뭔가 부족해...
보스라면 공격과 방어의 균형을 잡으라고 말씀하실 것 같은데....
이렇게 된 이상 공격도 방어도 철저하게 한다. GO로켓단에 걸맞는 파워 밸런스를 만들겠어!

Congratulations! You completed this stamp rally!
A stamp rally is an activity where you collect stamps at various PokéStops and Gyms.
If you visit target PokéStops and Gyms, a stamp sheet will automatically appear. Interact with it to receive a stamp.

Some stamp rallies allow you to collect stamps together with friends, even if you can't visit the PokéStop yourself. If your friend who is at a level of {0} or higher sends you a gift from that PokéStop, it will also progress your collection!
Some stamp rallies offer items or other rewards for collecting stamps. Collect lots of stamps and encounter many great things!

This gift includes a stamp for a Stamp Rally. Your friend will also receive a gift with a Stamp Rally stamp, allowing them to collect it remotely.

Stamp markers will be displayed above the PokéStops included in the stamp rally.
When you tap on these PokéStops, the stamp sheet will automatically appear.

If there is progress in the stamp rally, the stamp button will be displayed in the menu on the right side of the map until the date changes. By pressing this button, you can easily check the progress of that stamp rally.
